amendment.description: To state the sense of the Senate on a report on the detention and April 11, 2003, escape in Yemen of the suspects in the attack on the U.S.S. Cole.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1279 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 1279 proposed by Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S9531-9532; text: CR S9531) To state the sense of the Senate on a report on the detention and April 11, 2003, escape in Yemen of the suspects in the attack on the U.S.S. Cole.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1279 proposed by Senator Feingold.
